title: imac 21.5 - 820-2494-A turn only in SMC mode
message: I gave the smc heat 150 for approx 4 min..but no cure..tips, tricks?

title: imac 21.5 - 820-2494-A turn only in SMC mode
message: Clean off the crud from the XDP connector pads, it is above the SMC. Also what happens if you normally power on?

title: imac 21.5 - 820-2494-A turn only in SMC mode
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 5880"]Clean off the crud from the XDP connector pads, it is above the SMC. Also what happens if you normally power on?[/QUOTE]

I cleaned all the board inclusive the XDP pads but no luck, when power normally the fan spin like a millimetre and stops and as mentioned it runs in full power only when pressed power long and inserting power cable.

title: imac 21.5 - 820-2494-A turn only in SMC mode
message: I honesty have no idea with this one.
